element.name: ToolTip
element.description: ToolTip widgets represent popup windows that are used to inform or warn the user

style.name: ICON_ERROR
style.description: The image used for ToolTips with style SWT#ICON_ERROR.

style.name: ICON_INFORMATION
style.description: The image used for ToolTips with style SWT#ICON_INFORMATION.

style.name: ICON_WARNING
style.description: The image used for ToolTips with style SWT#ICON_WARNING.

property.name: background-image
property.description: Background image or gradient for tooltip widget.

property.name: opacity
property.description: The opacity of the tooltip widget. A value between 0 and 1.

property.name: border
property.description: The border that is drawn around tooltip widget.

property.name: border-top
property.description: The top side border for tooltip widgets.

property.name: border-right
property.description: The right side border for tooltip widgets.

property.name: border-bottom
property.description: The bottom side border for tooltip widgets.

property.name: border-left
property.description: The left side border for tooltip widgets.

property.name: border-radius
property.description: Border radius. The border radius has no effect if an enhanced border, like "inset" or "outset" is used.

property.name: animation
property.description: Supports animations-types "fadeIn" and "fadeOut". Others are ignored.

property.name: width
property.description: Fixed width for the tooltip. If set to auto the tooltip width will be calculated automatically.

property.name: height
property.description: Fixed height for the tooltip. If set auto the tooltip height will be calculated automatically.

style.name: ICON_ERROR
style.description: The image used for ToolTips with style SWT#ICON_ERROR.

style.description: The image used for ToolTips with style SWT#ICON_INFORMATION.

style.description: The image used for ToolTips with style SWT#ICON_WARNING.
